pages.title: Home
pages.content: Welcome to our SPA PWA! This is the home page where you can provide an overview of your application or website.

pages.name: about
pages.title: About
pages.content: This is the About page. Here you can provide information about yourself, your company, or your project.

pages.name: resume
pages.title: Resume
pages.content: This is the Resume page. You can list your professional experience, skills, education, and achievements here.

pages.name: contact
pages.title: Contact
pages.content: This is the Contact page. You can provide your contact information or a contact form here.
